meanings.definition: A coating applied to the underside of a vehicle to protect against corrosion.
meanings.sent1: The undercoatings on the car prevented rust from forming.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the undercoatings of your vehicle regularly for any signs of damage.
meanings.sent3: The undercoatings were like a shield, keeping the metal safe from harm.
meanings.sent4: The undercoatings acted as a barrier, warding off the effects of moisture and salt.
meanings.sent5: The undercoatings gleamed under the sunlight, a silent guardian against decay.

meanings.definition: The act of applying a protective layer underneath a surface.
meanings.sent1: Proper undercoatings require skill and precision to ensure full coverage.
meanings.sent2: The undercoatings were carefully applied to the foundation of the building.
meanings.sent3: The undercoatings process felt like painting a secret shield beneath the surface.
meanings.sent4: She approached her work with undercoatings like an artist adding depth to a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The undercoatings were the hidden heroes, safeguarding what lay above.
